title: Calories in General Tso Chicken
meta_description: Discover calories in general tso chicken per serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and easy tweaks for lighter versions.
assumptions: Restaurant-style serving (~200 g), battered and deep-fried chicken in sweet-spicy sauce; includes broccoli if standard.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant, recipe, portion size, frying method, and sauce amount. Check menus or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One serving of General Tso's chicken contains about 500 kcal, mostly from frying and sugary sauce.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaged or restaurant info.

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of general tso chicken?
faqs.a: Approximately 500 kcal for a standard 200 g restaurant serving.

faqs.q: Is general tso chicken high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 1200 mg per serving due to soy sauce and seasonings.

faqs.q: What's the protein in general tso chicken?
faqs.a: Around 30 g per serving, mainly from the chicken.

faqs.q: How to make general tso chicken lower calorie?
faqs.a: Bake the chicken, use less sugar in sauce, or air-fry to cut ~100 kcal.

faqs.q: Carbs in general tso chicken per 100 g?
faqs.a: About 20 g per 100 g, from the thickened sweet sauce.
